summary: Fix for the bugged quest line involving Esburn
descriptionHtml:
This fix is for a Quest Chain that involves Esbern. You will know you are bugged if he does not have any dialogue and does not open his door.

The files are extracted from the \"Skyrim - VoicesExtra.bsa\" that are not extracted properly for some people. You can extract the files yourself if you want.

//////INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS\\\\ \\\\\\
1. Extract Folder from from EsburnFix.rar in to your Data Folder.
2. Enjoy your fixed quest line.
author: MrMaple
